me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.transport.netty
Interface NettyConstants

All Known Implementing Classes:
NettyLMTPClientSession, SecureSMTPClientPipelineFactory, SMTPClientPipelineFactory
public interface NettyConstants

Constant fields which are used within the netty implementation to store state informations

Author:
Norman Maurer

Field Summary
static String CHUNK_WRITE_HANDLER_KEY
          The key to use when adding the ChunkedWriteHandler to the ChannelPipeline
static String CONNECT_HANDLER_KEY
          The key to use when adding the SMTPConnectHandler to the ChannelPipeline
static String FRAMER_KEY
          The key to used when adding the Framer to the ChannelPipeline
static String IDLE_HANDLER_KEY
          The key to use when adding the IdleStateHandler to the ChannelPipeline
static String SMTP_IDLE_HANDLER_KEY
          The key to use when adding the SMTPClientIdleHandler to the pipeline
static String SMTP_PIPELINING_REQUEST_ENCODER_KEY
          The key to use when adding the SMTPPipeliningRequestEncoder to the ChannelPipeline
static String SMTP_REQUEST_ENCODER_KEY
          The key to use when adding the SMTPRequestEncoder to the ChannelPipeline
static String SMTP_RESPONSE_DECODER_KEY
          The key to use when adding the SMTPResponseDecoder to the ChannelPipeline
static String SSL_HANDLER_KEY
          The key to use when adding the SslHandler to the pipeline
static String SSL_HANDSHAKE_HANDLER_KEY
          The key to use when adding the SslHandshakeHandler to the ChannelPipeline
